contributions_bad_request_message: {"contributions_url":["URL domain must be one of [www.buymeacoffee.com, donate.mozilla.org, flattr.com, github.com, ko-fi.com, liberapay.com, www.micropayment.de, opencollective.com, www.patreon.com, www.paypal.com, paypal.me]."]}
image_validation_messages: Images must be either PNG or JPG.
Images must be either PNG or JPG.
Upload a valid image. The file you uploaded was either not an image or a corrupted image.
Images must be square (same width and height).

summary_translations_from_locales_xpi.ar: يتعلم «غرير الخصوصية» تلقائيا أن يحجب المتعقبات الخفية
summary_translations_from_locales_xpi.en-US: Privacy Badger automatically learns to block invisible trackers.
summary_translations_from_locales_xpi.fr: Privacy Badger apprend automatiquement à bloquer les traqueurs invisibles.
summary_translations_from_locales_xpi.pl: Privacy Badger automatycznie uczy się blokować niewidoczne elementy śledzące.
summary_translations_from_locales_xpi.pt-BR: O Privacy Badger aprende automaticamente a bloquear rastreadores invisíveis.
summary_translations_from_locales_xpi.ru: Privacy Badger автоматически учится блокировать невидимые трекеры.
summary_translations_from_locales_xpi.zh-CN: 隐私獾会自动学习去阻止不可见的追踪器。
